products.title: Unicolour FR White Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Unicolour fr white roller blind in white. Made to measure from 8.77 with free uk mainland delivery. This roller blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Their white unicolour roller blind is a true white shade. Ideal for modern iterior styles. Light filtering & resistent to moisture. Their stunning unicolour range has been designed specifically with office & work environments in mind. The collection includes everything from subtle muted shades to well satured bright colour options.
 
 Product id: sdb-rbx2351 fabric colour: white material: 100% polyester headrail: durable aluminium roller tube supported by white steel brackets - top, face or side fix   control type: smooth continuous-looped chain energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - effective thermal retention light filtering: yes
